name: mediaInputSource_turnOn
description: This function is used to turn on the SmartThings device connected to a specific TV input source.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn on.

parameters.name: mediaInputSource
parameters.description: The input source to turn on.
